alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:59PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 645 PM MST... At 557 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary along a line extending from near Miami to near Central Heights- Midland City to 6 miles south of Globe. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Superior, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Boyce Thompson Arboretum, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 222 and 252. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 254. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 162 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Superior; Tonto Basin
